title: Catholic & Orthodox: Reflections on Internet Conversations, Conversions, and Contentions
description:
The increasing interest in the historical, liturgical and sacramental, churches has created a fascinating  landscape of internet discussions mixing the curious with Catholic and Orthodox believers, many of whom are young men intently focused on spiritual engagement. Herein, I offer both observations and cautions about these discussions.

How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
Introduction to Christianity: https://amzn.to/2A5pvZi
Pope Benedict XVI writings:  https://w2.vatican.va/content/benedict-xvi/en.html 
Paul VanderKlay’s channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
